org.grouplens.lenskit.util.table

Interface Column

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.Collection<java.lang.Object>, java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Object>, java.util.List<java.lang.Object>

    public interface Column
extends java.util.List<java.lang.Object>
    A view of a column of a table.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double average()
      Get the average of this column.
      double sum()
      Get the sum of this column.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.util.List

        add, add, addAll, addAll, clear, contains, containsAll, equals, get, hashCode, indexOf, isEmpty, iterator, lastIndexOf, listIterator, listIterator, remove, remove, removeAll, retainAll, set, size, subList, toArray, toArray

    • Method Detail

      • sum

        double sum()
        Get the sum of this column. Null entries result in a sum of NaN.
        Returns:
        The column's sum.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there are any non-null, non-numeric entries in the table.

      • average

        double average()
        Get the average of this column. Null entries and empty tables result in NaN.
        Returns:
        The column's average.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there are any non-null, non-numeric entries in the table.
